forum.content: The winter was extremely cold just like my mood before! However, nothing can discourage me from moving on in my life. Look! The cherry blossoms are still beautiful there and present their energy of life. Well, I can climb up bravely from the bottom of my valley, too! To end the winter time, it's the beginning of the spring time full of power of life! Cheer up. and keep on going!
forum.title: To end the winter time...
